title: Global ID
description: Globally unique identifier for the record

ID.title: ID
ID.description: ID as used originally by the datacollector

dataCollectorsGeolocation.title: Geolocation of the datacollecting organisation
dataCollectorsGeolocation.description: Location of the frontdoor of head office of the organisation that collected the data indicated by WGS84 Lat-Long Coordinates ddd.dddd

collectionTimeDateStamp.title: Date-time of data collection
collectionTimeDateStamp.description: Date when the data has been collected by the data collecting organisation
